de.lmu.dbs.jfeaturelib.utils

Class DerivativeImage

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.dbs.jfeaturelib.utils.DerivativeImage

  • public class DerivativeImage
extends java.lang.Object
    Calculates the standard derivatives Dx and Dy of an image using a -1,0,1 kernel and stores the results in separate ImageProcessors. The kernel can be modified by the according setter methods. Gradient lenghts and orientations can be obtained easily by using GradientImage.
    See Also:
    GradientImage
